content.title: Artificial Intelligence
content.desc: Model of machine learning and deep learning (Computer vision, NLP)

content.title: iHeart Project
content.desc: A Medical Project involving AI Model Development to help patients to predict their risk of cardiovascular disease. With retinal section images as a basis.

content.title: Aroma Project
content.desc: A Medical Project involving AI Model Development to check whether or not eye images can be used for future studies. With retinal section images as a basis.
